title: Sickening Moment Men High Five After Raping Woman In Nightclub
text:
In what is a horrific and brazen act of sexual assault, CCTV has caught the moment two men high five one another after raping a drunk woman.

This week, Italian students Ferdinando Orlando and Lorenzo Costanzo were found guilty of the rape that occurred in the Toy Room Club in London, The Sun reports.

The pair met their victim, who was described as “10 out of 10 drunk”, on the dancefloor and six minutes later dragged her into a maintenance room where they carried out the attack.

The woman’s injuries were so extensive that 230 mililitres of blood was drained from a wound following the attack, with one doctor describing it as an “unusually severe injury”.

Doctors who examined the woman reported a bite on her neck, bruising between her legs, on her bottom, shoulder and leg and The Sun reports she later required surgery.

Men don’t rape women, rapists rape women - this is the conversation we all need to have. Plus, this woman shares her heartbreaking rape story to help others.

The woman says she remembers little of the attack but recalls being in intense pain.

“I remember being very drunk and falling over a lot and then I was in the toilets of the club in so much pain, not wanting to get out, and then I remember being on the street, sitting on the sidewalk,” she said.

“I was very swollen, I could barely walk and there was a lot of bruising. I was very scared.”

The men filmed their 16-minute attack, rearranged the woman’s outfit and then left her in the nightclub toilets.

Prosecutor Allison Hunter QC said that CCTV footage of the men leaving the club depicts them “hugging, high-fiving each other … laughing.”

The men admitted to playing the footage of the rape back in a joking fashion.

Christina Smith of the Crown Prosecution Service said the two men had “denied responsibility for their sickening actions” at every opportunity.

“They took advantage of a vulnerable woman, who had clearly lost the capacity to consent to sexual activity,” she said, according to reports from The Sun.

Orlando and Costanzo will be sentenced at a later date.

If you or someone you know needs help, please contact the National Sexual Assault, Domestic and Family Violence Counselling Service on 1800 RESPECT for 24/7 support.
description: The CCTV footage shows the blatant disregard the two men had for their victim.
